result.title: There is a strange code,it will terminat normally on my own machine,but will TLE on CF in every C++ compile
result.content:
include<stdio.h>

{

double x=-1.99999999999999980000;

while(x>-2.0&&x-1==-3.0)
   puts("orz");

}
